thread.title: Police officer assaulted, man Tasered, after attempted theft in Kihikihi
thread.title_full: Police officer assaulted, man Tasered, after attempted theft in Kihikihi

title: Police officer assaulted, man Tasered, after attempted theft in Kihikihi
text:
Police officer assaulted, man Tasered, after attempted theft in Kihikihi Last updated 15:47, February 19 2017 SUPPLIED 
One of the four was Tasered by police. 
A police officer was assaulted by four hooligans who tried to steal alcohol from a store in Kihikihi. 
The four offenders, aged between 15 and 39, were foiled in their attempt to rob a liquor store. 
One of the group, a man, was Tasered. 
The offenders were interrupted by the owner and a confrontation ensued, said a spokeswoman from the police media centre. 
"A police unit was nearby and respond quickly while the incident was unfolding," the spokeswoman said. 
"During the incident, a police officer was assaulted and received minor injuries and the store owner was assaulted but was not injured," the spokeswoman said. 
Four people were arrested. 
Three of those arrested will be appearing in court on a number of charges including disorderly behaviour, refusing a request for blood, threatening behaviour and assaulting police. 
The fourth offender will be appearing in the Youth Court charged with assaulting police, disorderly behaviour, shoplifting and assault.
